Our advanced algorithm analyzes subtle nuances to consistently deliver precise results, ensuring you never miss a beat when it matters most. The perfect solution where every detail counts in real-time language identification with unparalleled reliability and accuracy tailored specifically for high-stakes applications.

function.description: Detects the language of text within a request.

text.description: The input text upon which to perform language detection. Repeat this parameter to perform language detection on multiple text inputs.
